Text: You will be asked a question with the Likert Trial Type.
How often do you use social media? | Not very much | Like, a lot |
The trial type can also change the the intervals of the options.
More specifically, how often do you use social media? | Not very much | Like, a lot |
You may also use words or letters instead of numbers.
What kinds of grades did you get last quarter? | Don't ask | The best |
